data.subject: ComfyUI-SaveQueues
data.question: What does ComfyUI-SaveQueues add to ComfyUI?
data.answer: ComfyUI-SaveQueues adds a button to the menu to save and load the running queue and the pending queues.

data.subject: ComfyUI-SaveQueues
data.question: What can I do with the queues after using ComfyUI-SaveQueues?
data.answer: With ComfyUI-SaveQueues, you can save and load the running queue and the pending queues.

data.subject: ComfyUI-SaveQueues
data.question: Why would I want to use ComfyUI-SaveQueues?
data.answer: You would want to use ComfyUI-SaveQueues when you want to exit ComfyUI with queues still remaining.

data.subject: ComfyUI-SaveQueues
data.question: How do I install ComfyUI-SaveQueues?
data.answer: To install ComfyUI-SaveQueues, use `git clone https://github.com/pkpkTech/ComfyUI-SaveQueues` in your ComfyUI custom_nodes directory.
